text: The Cathedral of Saint Mary of Toledo (also called Primate Cathedral of Toledo, Spain) is one of the three 13th century High Gothic cathedrals in Spain. The Toledo Cathedral was one of 100 finalists for the 12 Treasures of Spain in 2007. ==References== ;In Spanish * Camón Aznar, José. Historia general del arte, Tomo XVIII, colección Summa Artis. title: Toledo Cathedral
